thread.title: Democratic debate doesn't include much health policy talk
thread.title_full: Democratic debate doesn't include much health policy talk

title: Democratic debate doesn't include much health policy talk
text:
Democratic debate doesn't include much health policy talk 
Modern Healthcare: During the first debate between Democratic presidential hopefuls Tuesday, candidates barely touched on healthcare issues.The debate, hosted in Las Vegas by CNN, featured front-runner Hillary Clinton and Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders, who has been rising in the polls as a challenger. Also on stage were Maryland Gov. Martin O'Malley, former Sen. Jim Webb of Virginia and former Sen. Lincoln Chafee of Rhode Island, who all face far lower polling numbers.
